attributes.action: Any person who is unemployed or claiming incapacity benifits etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am asking the people of the UK to sign this if they are on the dole, jobs seekers allowance, incapacity etc. 
LETS GET THE REAL UNEMPLOYMENT FIGURES, IM NOW ON THE DOLE (AGAIN) AND SICK OF THE INCORRECT NUMBERS STATED BY THIS GOVERMENT!!!!!!!
C SMYTHE SHEFFIELD

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
